articles.content: When The Lancet and The New England Journal of Medicinepulled an influential pair of Covid-19 papers last Thursday, it was a rare event in scientific publishing. For medical researchers, this was lik… [+4521 chars]

articles.title: Coronavirus: more than a dozen US states see record high of new cases - The Guardian
articles.description: Fourteen states and Puerto Rico see highest seven-day average of new infections, as restrictions to slow the spread are being relaxed
articles.content: A total of 14 states and the US territory of Puerto Rico have recorded their worst week yet for new coronavirus infections, with Texas hitting a record high in Covid-19 hospitalizations, all while re… [+5278 chars]
